channel.title: WIFI AP on KUBEDGE's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in WIFI AP on KUBEDGE's Blog

item.title: Setting up HOSTAPD on 5G NR node
item.description: This tutorial how to setup WIFI AccessPoint on PI simulating 5G NR node

item.title: Setting up DHCPD on 5G NR Node
item.description: This tutorial how to setup DHCPD and NAT so that the UE can access the internet through the AP & NAT running on 5G NR simulating PI. This tutorial also describe how to setup the DHCPD to automatically allocated IPs to UE or PCs.
